original_text: So it was not you who sent me here, but God. He has made me a father to Pharaoh, and lord of all his house and ruler over all the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 그런즉 나를 이리로 보낸 이는 당신들이 아니요 하나님이시라 하나님이 나를 바로에게 아버지로 삼으시고 그 온 집의 주로 삼으시며 애굽 온 땅의 통치자로 삼으셨나이다

sentences.original_text: So it was not you who sent me here
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 당신이 나를 이곳에 보낸 것이 아니었습니다

sentences.original_text: He has made me a father to Pharaoh
and lord of all his house
and ruler over all the land of Egypt
